price: 127. Мре lolenge wana nde topesaka etumbu na oyo azali kondima te, mpe azali kolekisa ndelo na bilembo bia Nkolo wa ye. Kasi etumbu ya mokolo ya suka ekozalaka makasi mpe ekotikalaka libela.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَنۡ أَسۡرَفَ وَلَمۡ يُؤۡمِنۢ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِۦۚ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَشَدُّ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika najzī man asrafa walam yu'min biāyāti rabbihi walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati ashaddu wa-abqā
